com.punchline.javalib.entities

Class EntityManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.punchline.javalib.entities.EntityManager

  • public class EntityManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains and organizes game Entities, sorting them according to tag, group, and type for easy access.
    Author:
    Nathaniel
